name: PhaSMM
description:
Metadata is not data. There is no incriminating evidence, no personal information contained in metadata. If you have nothing to hide, you have nothing to fear.

Look through the call logs and social media pages of these strangers, and try to piece together their lives. Flag suspicious persons for further investigation, and make the world safer.

Send your interpretations of the stories to @Fenreliania on twitter, or email Fenreliania@gmail.com
